title: Blog problem
content:
I noticed today the following notice at the top of my Typophile blog:  
"You are not allowed to post a new blog entry."

To my recollection, I never got a warning or explanation that blog posting would be suspended or disabled. Is this affecting anyone else?
author: cuttlefish

comments.content:
FWIW mine is not disabled. Of all people. ;-)

hhp
Cuttlefish, the blog is open to select writers. If you'd like to be a regular contributor, send me a message with your goals and/or some samples of the types of things you'd like to write.
